alert.note: Alert for Eastern Curry County and Josephine County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 23 at 5:27PM PDT by NWS Medford
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Josephine County through 600 PM PDT... At 526 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hellgate Overlook, or 11 miles northwest of Grants Pass. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and up to half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hellgate Overlook, Sunny Valley, Indian Mary Park, Merlin and I 5 Sexton Summit. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Curry County and Josephine County
